column4: I'm trying to capture sound in Ubuntu. Actually, I can caputre and play the sound captured. But I cannot listen to the sound I'm capturing while I'm capturing. Any pointers?
what source are you capturing from?
on MIC i get the same result
can you listen to line in when not capturing?
in the mixer did you double check that mute is not checked on both the input and output level of line-in and mic?
and for giggles try to mute then unmute
well, it's unmuted... The input level bar is moving
well i just checked mine and i have the same thing lol
guess I'll have to reboot and do it in win...
use alsamixer and activate the the source with m
how to listen when not capturing
